title: MAN Overboard!
body_text:
The first Saturday of '09, his last captaining the ship. It was time for a much-needed change and little would he have expected such reward to follow - - -
One year ago, unbeknown to his fellow shipmates, he plunged off the boat and into the water, swimming to the sight of a
new light
.
He feels no regret but vows never to forget.
EastCoastDodgeball: The Tronolone Years
September 3, 2005 - January 3, 2009
body_html:
The first Saturday of '09, his last captaining the ship. It was time for a much-needed change and little would he have expected such reward to follow - - -

One year ago, unbeknown to his fellow shipmates, he plunged off the boat and into the water, swimming to the sight of a new light.

He feels no regret but vows never to forget.

EastCoastDodgeball: The Tronolone Years
September 3, 2005 - January 3, 2009
